name: Gninja Pig
description:
Gninja Pig is a platformer 2D game with pixel art. A unique dose of cuteness with movements and attacks to take on challenges. Humans disappeared after a mysterious disaster, so you have to survive on your own but maybe you’ll find allies in your adventure.
Avoid traps, fight or avoid enemies, complete objectives and mostly, have fun.
Guinea Pig animations created exclusively for the game, and this game is developed only by me.

Guinea Pig owners will recognize references to guinea pig life and other people could just enjoy the parkour and combat of this game.

Release Date Is Approximately Middle 2023.
